RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 10500. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2022 - 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 11, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since April 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming races for $4,000 or less not co nsidered in eligibility and allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: D'ARCHER set the pace with a clear lead and held safely while kept to task. EASTER MUSIC stalked the pace while racing inside, shifted out for the drive, failed to rally and finished second best. RISKY BOY stalked the pace, went five wide leaving the turn, lacked a stretch response and settled for show. FORT RIDGE trailed the field and showed little. BORN AGAIN GEORGE lost the rider at the start. The stewards' posted an inquiry concerning the start. No change was made.

ENTRY.NAME: Easter Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, shifted out for drive, failed to rally, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: D'archer
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead, held safely, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Fort Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, showed little, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Born Again George
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost jockey start

ENTRY.NAME: Risky Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 5wide into stretch, lacked a stretch response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 14000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE FOR A CLAIMING PRICE EXCEEDING $6,500 SINCE NOVEMBER 7, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since April 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming r aces for $5,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHACKLEFORD STRONG was unhurried early, raced outside, advanced on the turn, went six wide entering the stretch, closed with a rush, got up late and won going away. SOUPER FORTUNE pressed the pace along the inside, challenged two across on the turn, went willingly to the wire, was outclosed and got up late for place. THE LAST FACT set a pressured pace, faltered near the sixteenth pole and held safely for show. CHRISTMAS PRESENT failed to respond in an inside trip. IDEA MAN stalked the pace, dropped back on the turn and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Souper Fortune
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside,challenged 2across turn,outclosed, up late for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Christmas Present
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip, failed to respond, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Shackleford Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w leaving turn, closed with a rush, up late, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Idea Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, dropped back turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: The Last Fact
ENTRY.COMMENT: set a pressured pace, faltered near 1/16, safe for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 117 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over since April 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250 (Claiming races for $4,000 or less not considered in esti mating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWESOME WILLY raced in hand early, vied inside to the turn, drew off for a clear lead, bore out in the stretch drive and held under pressure. IMPULSIVENESS was unhurried early, raced outside, rallied around the turn, went eight wide entering the stretch, went willingly to the wire and didn't have enough late. STOLICH settled off the pace, rallied three wide on the turn to loom a threat, fell back and settled for show. KEEN RESPONSE lagged early, closed mid track and hung late. WHERE'S LUCKY dropped inside to save ground, angled out in the upper stretch and offered a mild bid only. OPTION vied two across to the turn, fell back and gave way. MASQUERADE BALL raced mid pack in an even effort and failed to menace. MADELYNS HEAT raced in the back, advanced to the turn, had nothing left for the drive and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Stolich
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, rallied 3wide turn, loomed a threat, fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Willy
ENTRY.OWNER: Ritter Charles W and Becker Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand early, vied inside, drew off turn, bore out stretch, held

ENTRY.NAME: Option
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2across to turn, fell back, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Masquerade Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, even effort, lacked a bid, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Keen Response
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged early, closed mid track, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Impulsiveness
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced outside, rallied turn, 8wide bid, willingly,not enough late

ENTRY.NAME: Madelyns Heat
ENTRY.COMMENT: in the back, advanced to turn, nothing left for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Where's Lucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped inside, saved ground, angled out for drive, mild bid only

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 77. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Preference by condition eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YO DAWG veered out at the start, vied inside to the stretch and drew off in the drive. WOLF HUNTER broke out, saved ground, advanced along the rail on the turn and closed to get up late for place. EASY FAST was pushed out at the start, vied two across to the stretch, fell back and was caught for second. MINING CAMP stalked the pace while racing along the inside, bid, hung late and failed to menace. REJECTION HURTS bumped and was crowded at the start, raced mid pack, bid and came up empty. J J'S SOLUTION was outrun in an even effort. RUSSIAN STANDARD bumped at the start and failed to threaten. JAKES CHANNEL showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Wolf Hunter
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, saved ground, advanced rail turn, closed, up late 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Rejection Hurts
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, crowded start, raced mid pack, bid, came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Russian Standard

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of JEB

ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no threat, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Jakes Channel
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor, outrun, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Mining Camp
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked insiade, bid, hung late, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: J J's Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: even effort, no factor, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Yo Dawg
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out start, vied inside to stretch, drew off in drive

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed out start,vied 2across, fell back upper stretch, caught 2d

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since April 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming races for $20,000 or less not considered in estimating allowance s).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNCLE HEADLEY was crowded at the start, raced outside, went seven wide at the top of the stretch, drifted in and drew clear late. MONGOLIAN BEE went four wide entering the stretch, altered course near the eighth pole and closed well to earn place. PRIZE FIGHTER set the pace with a clear lead, faltered past the eighth pole and held for show. BUREAU was slow early, angled out in the upper stretch and finished well. GALLANT BUCK came out at the start, chased the pace and lacked the needed late response. VERRAZANOINTHESKY saved ground, was checked along the rail on the back stretch and put in a steady effort. MODIFIER was carried out at the start, slow early, swung wide entering the stretch and lacked a bid. BRUCE BANNER was not a factor. I'M YOUR CAPTAIN raced close to the pace while racing inside, bid along the rail and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Verrazanointhesky
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, checked rail backstretch, steady effort

ENTRY.NAME: Prize Fighter
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead, faltered past 1/8, held for show

ENTRY.NAME: Bureau
ENTRY.OWNER: Pohl Dennis and Gavilsky II Lawrence J
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, angled out upper stretch, finished well,

ENTRY.NAME: Bruce Banner
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Your Captain
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace inside, bid rail, came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Headley
ENTRY.COMMENT: crowded start, 7wide top of stretch, drifted in, clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Mongolian Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4wide into stretch, altered course mid stretch, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Gallant Buck
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out start, chased pace, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Modifier
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out start, slow early, swung wide into stretch, no bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 31500. FOR ILLINOIS REGISTERED, CONCEIVED AND/OR FOALED. Fillies And Mares Three Years Old and Upward Which Have Not Won A State Bred Race Other Than Maiden, Claiming, Or Starter or Which Have Never Won Two Races. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non- winners of a race since April 11 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming races for $20,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference by condition eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEG BORROW N STEAL got through inside on the turn, angled out mid stretch, surged and drew off late. SLEEPY CAT was sent to the front to set the pace, was headed near the sixteenth pole and was outclosed toi finish second best. GHAALEB'S RANGER lagged early while racing outside, went seven wide at the top of the stretch and closed to earn show. TIME BREAK got away well, raced close to the pace, went six wide at the top of the stretch and lacked the needed rally. CAT ROYALE veered out at the start, advanced inside on the turn, angled out for the drive and lacked a bid. FROSTED ECLAIR stalked the pace, challenged for the lead on the turn, dropped back and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Frosted Eclair
ENTRY.OWNER: Gavilsky II Lawrence J Pohl Dennis Throm Keith H and Throm Collin
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, challenged turn, dropped back, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Sleepy Cat
ENTRY.OWNER: Robertson Hugh H Mentz John and Fisher Ray D
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent to front, set pace, headed near 1/16, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Beg Borrow N Steal
ENTRY.COMMENT: got through inside turn, angled out mid stretch, surged, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Time Break
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, close to pace, 6wide top of stretch, failed to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Ghaaleb's Ranger
ENTRY.OWNER: Ritter Charles W and Becker Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged outside, 7wide top of stretch, closed well, earned show

ENTRY.NAME: Cat Royale
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out start, advanced inside turn, angled out, lacked a bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 98. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 33000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $40,000. Three Year Olds, 117 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over since April 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Claiming races for $25,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference by condition eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EMPIRE BUILDER set the pace, drew off on the turn and extended the lead to win handily. SILVER QUARTERS broke in, was unhurried early and raced in the back, rallied on the turn, went widest in the drive and was no match for the winner. GITA'S LAD raced close to the pace along the inside, bid along the rail on the turn, shifted out and failed to rally. BABA'S BOY was slow early, put in a steady effort and improved position. WISE VERDICT raced close to the pace while racing between horses, fell back on the turn and gave way. SOUL COAXING raced close to the pace while three across, flattened out and dropped back. KHOZAN'S VALENTINE was unprepared at the start, pressed the pace to the turn and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Baba's Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, steady effort, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Quarters
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, unhurried early, rallied turn, widest drive, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Soul Coaxing
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, raced 3across, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Gita's Lad
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, raced inside, bid rail turn, shifted out, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Empire Builder
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drew off turn, extended lead, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Wise Verdict
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace between horses, fell back turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Khozan's Valentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: unprepared start, pressed pace to 2nd turn, tired,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Claiming Purse 13500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SALLY'S SUPRISE veered out at the start, pressed the pace, assumed command between horses on the turn with a short lead, drew away late and held off the late charge of PACIFIC VIEW. PACIFIC VIEW showed good early speed while racing inside, fell back, came again, angled out late, surged and was gaining late. TWICK OR TWEAT set a pressured pace to the turn, flell back, continued in a steady effort and held for show. LADA KALINA was carried out at the start, pressed the pace, challenged for the lead on the turn and fell back. SONG OF AMERICA was carried out at the start, ran up behind horses and was checked on the backstretch, continued willingly, bid and hung late. MISS MIA improved position in a steady effort. THE SCORE IS EVEN ducked in at the start and was outrun. DILLYDILLY DIAMOND distanced the field.

ENTRY.NAME: The Score Is Even
ENTRY.OWNER: Ritter Charles W and Becker Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked in start, no factor, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Pacific View
ENTRY.COMMENT: early speed inside, fell back, came again, angled out late,surged

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Mia
ENTRY.COMMENT: steady effort, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Twick Or Tweat
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace to turn, fell back, steady close,held for show

ENTRY.NAME: Dillydilly Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: distanced,

ENTRY.NAME: Sally's Suprise
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out start, took over turn, drew clear late, held well

ENTRY.NAME: Song of America
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out start, ran up behind horses, checked backstretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Lada Kalina
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out start, pressed pace, challenged turn, fell back
